roleset.name: unable to be surgically removed

example.name: arg1
example.text: She presented with a pelvic mass in 2008 treated with chemotherapy and radiation and the lesion was felt to be unresectable at that time .

roleset.note: UNRESECTABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. Relation to resect.01 (from unresectable.01-j)
